title.value: Data Standards Wales UEC Message Event

description.value: This CodeSystem indicates the valid message events for use within a message bundle submitting data related to an attendance at an urgent and emergency care facility.

definition.value: Indicates a message event reporting the arrival of a patient at a UEC facility.
Indicates a message event reporting the triage of a patient at a UEC facility.
Indicates a message event reporting the discharge of a patient from a UEC facility.
